merits.name: Acute Senses
merits.description: Your physical senses are unusually sharp, capturing nuances that few people ever notice.
merits.gameEffects: Reduces difficulty of Perception-based rolls by -2. At 1-point level, a single sense is more acute; at 3-point level, all five physical senses are equally sharp.

merits.name: Dark Triad
merits.description: A charming blend of narcissism, Machiavellianism, and sociopathy makes you a smooth-talking rule-breaker.
merits.gameEffects: Adds three dice to Seduction, Manipulation, Leadership, Subterfuge, and Charisma-based rolls. Story downside: amoral behavior may have consequences.

merits.name: Language
merits.description: Beyond your native language, you understand another form of communication.
merits.gameEffects: Each 1-pt Merit reflects a single language. With 5+ Language Merits, can attempt to unravel unknown languages (Intelligence + Enigmas, difficulty 7+).

flaws.name: Addiction
flaws.description: You're addicted to some activity or substance that interferes with your daily life.
flaws.gameEffects: 1 point for harmless habits, 3 points for dangerous/illegal substances. Drives character to irrational extremes.

flaws.name: Cursed
flaws.description: Misfortune of apparently supernatural origins makes your character's life difficult.
flaws.gameEffects: Severity increases with point value: 1pt = minor quirks, 3pt = chronic misfortune, 5pt = pervasive bad luck.
